articles.title: 'I'm spitting mad': Elizabeth Warren shares anger over ruling in interview - CNN Video
articles.description: Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D-MA) says she is spitting mad over the Supreme Court overturning Roe v. Wade and insists the ruling is not what America wants.

articles.author: Kate Sullivan, CNN
articles.title: Biden says 'health and life of women' is at risk after Supreme Court strikes down Roe v. Wade
articles.description: President Joe Biden said Friday that "the health and life of women in this nation are now at risk" after the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade and eliminated the constitutional right to an abortion.
articles.content: (CNN)President Joe Biden said Friday that "the health and life of women in this nation are now at risk" after the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade and eliminated the constitutional right to an ab… [+1615 chars]

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Analysis: Donald Trump's lasting legacy will now be the overturning of Roe v. Wade
articles.description: During his run for the Republican presidential nomination in 2016, Donald Trump had one sure-fire way to beat back doubts about his conservative bona fides: he would talk about who he might appoint, if given the chance, to the Supreme Court.
articles.content: (CNN)During his run for the Republican presidential nomination in 2016, Donald Trump had one sure-fire way to beat back doubts about his conservative bona fides: he would talk about who he might appo… [+4857 chars]

articles.title: Anti-abortion activist grows emotional after Roe v. Wade is overturned - CNN Video
articles.description: Americans are divided over the Supreme Court's decision to overturn Roe v. Wade, which ends a federal constitutional right to an abortion after almost 50 years.

articles.author: Opinion by O. Carter Snead
articles.title: Opinion: Roe was very bad for America. The court gives us a chance to reset
articles.description: O. Carter Snead writes, "By my lights, Roe and its progeny have been very bad for America. By virtue of those precedents, the Supreme Court imposed on the nation an extreme, one-size fits all regulatory regime for abortion of its own invention, without any ju…
articles.content: O. Carter Snead is a professor of law, director of the de Nicola Center for Ethics and Culture at the University of Notre Dame and author of "What It Means to be Human: The Case for the Body in Publi… [+5366 chars]

articles.author: Ariel Edwards-Levy, CNN
articles.title: Broad majority of Americans didn't want Roe v. Wade overturned, polling prior to Supreme Court decision shows
articles.description: A broad majority of Americans did not want to see Roe v. Wade overturned, according to polling taken before the Supreme Court ruled Friday that there is no longer a federal constitutional right to an abortion.

articles.author: Tierney Sneed
articles.title: Justices spar over how Roe reversal puts precedents on gay rights and contraceptives at risk
articles.description: The Supreme Court's opinion overturning Roe v. Wade on Friday could open the door for courts to overturn same-sex marriage, contraception and other rights.
articles.content:
(CNN)The Supreme Court's opinion overturning Roe v. Wade on Friday could open the door for courts to overturn same-sex marriage, contraception and other rights.
